clumpy.models.allocation¶

clumpy.models.allocation(luc_initial, luc_final, luc_start, regions, params_regions, path)[source]¶

Allocation function according to regions parameters.

Parameters

  • luc_initial (LandUseLayer) – Initial land use for calibration.

  • luc_final (LandUseLayer) – Final land use for calibration.

  • luc_start (LandUseLayer) – Start land use for allocation.

  • regions (list(Region)) – List of Region objects.

  • params_regions (list(RegionParams)) – List of region parameters objects.

  • path (str) – The path to save the allocated map (tif file).

Returns

luc_allocated – Allocated land use.

Return type

LandUseLayer

Previous topic

clumpy.models.RegionParams
